content:
Hi All

Please accept this message as a reminder of the TSMG regular meeting for this week.

Date / Time:
Tue Oct 12, 2021 05:00 PM (US Eastern Time, GMT -4 DST)
Tue Oct 12 2021 21:00 PM (UTC)
Calendar (.ICS) file attached.
Please consult http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20211012T1700&p1=784 for your local times.

Web Meeting Info (NOTE: Zoom link has changed).
https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/95054745574?pwd=RXhhTjdsWktUYjJQRXJFTW10NGpRZz09 | Meeting ID: 950 5474 5574 | Passcode: 710256 | Note waiting room has been enabled, a host will have to let you in after you join.

For further information or if you encounter any problems, please contact a member of the TSMG via Zulip (chat.fhir.org) in the #TSMG stream.

Thank you and kind regards,
Reuben
